title: Still looking for OLD JUDGE beaters... skinned/trimmed ok!
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Still looking for OLD JUDGE beaters... skinned/trimmed ok!
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone...  

Thanks to the BST I've picked up quite a few OLD JUDGE N172 beaters...
I'm still looking for more however!  Skinned and trimmed is fine, as long as its got a beater price!

PM or email me with a scan and a price!

Thanks!
Eric

Thanks a couple of you emailed me and I was able to purchase 6 OJs like this last week.

I'm still looking for more!
